info.title: Azure Sphere V2 Management
info.description: Use these APIs to manage Azure Sphere V2 in your Azure subscription.

get.description: List the operations for the provider
List Catalog resources by subscription ID
List Artifact resources by subscription ID
List Certificate resources by subscription ID
List DeviceRegistration resources by subscription ID
List ProvisioningPackage resources by subscription ID
List SyndicationChannel resources by subscription ID
List UpdatePackage resources by subscription ID
List Catalog resources by resource group

properties.description: The resource-specific properties for this resource.

Artifact.description: An Azure Sphere artifact is a binary can be deployed to an Azure Sphere device.

value.description: The Artifact items on this page

nextLink.description: The link to the next page of items

ArtifactListResult.description: The response of a Artifact list operation.

sha256Hash.description: Optional: The Sha256 hash of the artifact. If provided it will be used to verify the contents retrieved from the provided Uri.

sasUri.description: The Azure Blob SAS Uri of the artifact.

ArtifactUpdate.description: The type used for update operations of the Artifact.

AttestationPolicy.description: Options for values on attestation policy.

properties.description: The resource-specific properties for this resource.

value.description: The Catalog items on this page

nextLink.description: The link to the next page of items

CatalogListResult.description: The response of a Catalog list operation.

CatalogProperties.description: The properties of Azure Sphere Catalog.

CatalogUpdate.description: The type used for update operations of the Catalog.

CatalogUpdateProperties.description: The updatable properties of the Catalog.

properties.description: The resource-specific properties for this resource.

value.description: The Certificate items on this page

nextLink.description: The link to the next page of items

CertificateListResult.description: The response of a Certificate list operation.

certificate.description: Base64 representation of the catalog certificate.

CompatibilityProperties.description: Compatibility properties for a syndication channel.

properties.description: The resource-specific properties for this resource.

value.description: The Deployment items on this page

nextLink.description: The link to the next page of items

DeploymentListResult.description: The response of a Deployment list operation.

updatePackageName.description: The name of the update package to deploy.

updatePackageSnapshot.description: A snapshot of the update package, taken at the time of deployment.

syndicationChannelSnapshot.description: A snapshot of the syndication channel, taken at the time of deployment.

dependencyUpdatePackages.description: A snapshot of the update package, taken at the time of deployment.

versionIdentifier.description: A string that uniquely identifies the set of artifacts being deployed.

aduDeploymentId.description: The ID of the associated ADU deployment.

createdDateTimeUtc.description: The date time that the deployment was created.

deploymentDateTimeUtc.description: The date time that the deployment was successfully deployed.

DeploymentState.description: Options for values on attestation policy.

values.name: NotReady
values.description: The update package has not met the requirements for deployment.

values.name: Ready
values.description: The update package meets the requirements for deployment and may be deployed at any time. It has not yet been deployed to any syndication channels.

values.name: Deployed
values.description: The update package has been deployed to at least one syndication channel.

properties.description: The resource-specific properties for this resource.

token.description: Base64 encoded device authentication JWT token.

DeviceRegistrationGenerateAuthTokenRespo.description: Output values of the generate auth token response.

value.description: The DeviceRegistration items on this page

nextLink.description: The link to the next page of items

DeviceRegistrationListResult.description: The response of a DeviceRegistration list operation.

attestationPublicKey.description: Attestation public key of the device.

DeviceRegistrationUpdate.description: The type used for update operations of the DeviceRegistration.

attestation.description: Policy if device attestation is required before delivering a certificate.

properties.description: The resource-specific properties for this resource.

version.description: Version of the provisioning package format.

ProvisioningPackageFormatActionResponse.description: Values of the format provisioning package response.

catalogName.description: Name of the catalog where the devices will be provisioned and activated.

baseEndpoint.description: Base of the endpoint of the catalog used in the device for the different AS3 services including attestation, device insights and others.

challenge.description: Unique random GUID proof of possession challenge value used during provisioning and activation stages to validate the possession of the private key in the device.

createdDate.description: An UTC creation date of the provisioning package.

expirationDate.description: An UTC expiration date of the provisioning package defined by the Catalog owner during provisioning package creation. New devices cannot be activated in the catalog after the expiration date.

ProvisioningPackageFormatActionResponseP.description: Detailed properties of the provisioning package

value.description: The ProvisioningPackage items on this page

nextLink.description: The link to the next page of items

ProvisioningPackageListResult.description: The response of a ProvisioningPackage list operation.

challenge.description: Proof of possession challenge value for device provisioning.

baseEndpoint.description: Base endpoint for data plane operations including devices to request a certificate with the attestation measurements and others.

expirationDate.description: Expiration date for his bulk device registration.

ProvisioningPackageUpdate.description: The type used for update operations of the ProvisioningPackage.

packageLocation.description: URI with the location of the activation package.

StartDevicesActivationActionRequest.description: Start bulk activation of devices request.

properties.description: The resource-specific properties for this resource.

value.description: The SyndicationChannel items on this page

nextLink.description: The link to the next page of items

SyndicationChannelListResult.description: The response of a SyndicationChannel list operation.

compatibilityData.description: Compatibility data of the syndication channel. This should match the compatibility properties of the associated Device Update compatibility set.

platform.description: The platform. Examples include: imx8ulp, qemuarm64.

dependencyChannels.description: Resource IDs of Azure Sphere syndication channels that provide required dependencies for the deployments made to the syndication channel.

SyndicationChannelUpdate.description: The type used for update operations of the SyndicationChannel.

compatibilityData.description: Compatibility data of the syndication channel. This should match the compatibility properties of the associated Device Update compatibility set.

dependencyChannels.description: Resource IDs of Azure Sphere syndication channels that provide required dependencies for the deployments made to the syndication channel.

SyndicationChannelUpdateProperties.description: The updatable properties of the SyndicationChannel.

properties.description: The resource-specific properties for this resource.

value.description: The UpdatePackage items on this page

nextLink.description: The link to the next page of items

UpdatePackageListResult.description: The response of a UpdatePackage list operation.

UpdatePackageUpdate.description: The type used for update operations of the UpdatePackage.

UpdatePackageUpdateProperties.description: The updatable properties of the UpdatePackage.

Certificate.serialNumber.name: serialNumber
Certificate.serialNumber.description: Serial number of the certificate. Use 'active' to retrieve the latest.
